II fldgi – wêlrK
msgqj
mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK ±kaùï ... 722
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla  NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu  i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk ±kaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m< lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd
Èkhka iy fõ,djka ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lsÍu i|yd ish¨ u oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod
Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy
fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a ld, fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d
iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla
meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq
fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m< lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr tkï" 2011 foieïn¾ ui 09
jeks Èk m< flfrk .eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2011 fkdjeïn¾ ui 25 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha
uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'

fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'
721 - B 80382—2,200 (2011/12)
D 1 -
    msgqj
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... —
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| ±kaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ ±kaùï ... ... ... —
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;= ... ... ... ... 741
úúO ±kaùï ... ... ... ... 748

ie' hq'- 2011'11'25 jeks Èk m< jQ wxl 1"734 ork .eiÜ m;%fha   I/III fldgi m< fkdùh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'12'02722
osid wêlrKh - fydrK
wjika jQ l,a.; ù we;s kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fydrK Èid wêlrKfha wjqreÿ 05lg jvd merKs jQ wjika lrk ,o kvq jd¾;d 539 la" 2012'02'03 jeks Èk fm' j' 8'30g fuu wêlrK
N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug lghq;= lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvq jd¾;djl fldgila fyda iïmQ¾K kvq jd¾;dfõ iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï ,shú,a,la ,nd
.ekSug wjYH kï ta i|yd 2012'02'03 jeks Èk fm' j' 8'30 g fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾ fj; tu b,a,Su bÈßm;a l< hq;= h'
t,a' ,shkwdrÉÑ"

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'12'02724
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - mdkÿr
l,a bl=;aj we;s kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj" wjika ù jir 5 lg jvd l,a bl=;a ù we;s my; wxl i|yka kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu i|yd f,aLk .; lr
we;'
tu kvq iïnkaOfhka hï ú;a;slrefjl=g fyda md¾Yjlrefjl=g ,shú,a,la fyda msgm;la ,nd.ekSug wjYH;djhla we;akï
2012'02'24 jeks Èkg fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jrhdf.ka meñK ,nd .kakd f,i fuhska okajñ'
fuu kvq jd¾;d 2012'03'02 Èfkka miqj mq¿iaid úkdY lrkq ,efí'
wd¾' tia' ta' Èidkdhl"
ufyia;%d;a$w;sf¾l Èid úksiqre"
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - mdkÿr'
2011 Tlaf;dan¾ ui 27 jeks Èk"
mdkÿr ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha § h'

^3& msgneoaor ;ekakfyakj;a;" ys mÈxÑ"  fndaú;ka;%S l=xpkd rxisud,s

pkaÈu ùrlafldä moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls
fudydka m%sho¾Yk o is,ajd jk uu" Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha md¾,sfïka;=fõ ia:djr ksfhda.j, wxl 48 ork ia:djr
ksfhda.h hgf;a —pkaÈu ùrlafldä moku ixia:d.; lsÍu i|yd jQ mk;ls˜ hkqfjka ye¢kafjk mk;a flgqïm;la md¾,sfïka;=fõ §
bÈßm;a lsÍug woyia lrk nj oekqï foñ'
mk;a flgqïmf;a wruqK jkqfha my; i|yka fmdÿ mrdud¾:j,ska hqla; jkakd jQ tlS moku ixia:d.; lsÍuhs (-

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2011'12'02 749
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
±kaùï iy m%ldYkhka i|yd wh lrkq ,nk
ixfYdaê; .dia;=
2009 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk isg
^iEu isl=rdod Èkhkays .eiÜ m;%h m< lrkq ,efí'&
1' ish¨ u ±kaùï iy m%ldYkhka m< lrkq ,nkafka m%isoaO lrkakdf.a j.lSu msgh'
2' fm!oa.,sl m<lrkakkaf.a ish¨ u ±kaùï iy m%ldYk ta i|yd kshñ; iïmQ¾K .dia;=j;a  iu. fld<U 08" fnd/,a," Y%S ,xld
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ uqøKd,hdêm;sg  ;emEf,ka tùug fyda f.keú;a  Ndr§ug mq¿jk'
3' ld¾hd, fõ,djka  fmrjre 8'30 isg miajre 4'15 olajd fõ'
